text: Donkey (not known by any other name) is the second main character seen in the movie Shrek. He is seen as the overly-happy and annoying sidekick of Shrek. He appears in all the Shrek movies. He is voiced by Eddie Murphy. == References == Category:Fictional mammals Category:Fictional characters introduced in 1990 Category:Fictional characters introduced in 2001 Category:Shrek characters
title: Donkey (Shrek)
